page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There is no large single employer in Bellerby. This is a rural area and the biggest group of people work on the land. Most of the people work out of Bellerby because there are not a lot of jobs. Most work in nearby Leyburn or Richmond. {Farming =}8 {Doctor =}1 {School employees =}4 {Coach firms =}2 {Dentist =}1 {Builders =}3 {Music Teacher =}1 {Teachers =}3 {Electrician =}1 {Army =}3 {Sales man =}1 {Cleaning lady =}1 {Works out of the area altogether =}2 {Dairy =}1 {Factory =}1 {Engineer =}1 {Auction Mart =}1{Post Office =}1 {Haulage Contracters =}1{Shop =}1 This is just a sample, the rest are employed in casual jobs, are retired or unemployed.
